observation: Partners in Growth | TCV  Powered by Cookiebot Consent Details [#IABV2SETTINGS#] About This website uses cookies We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. Consent Selection Necessary Preferences Statistics Marketing Show details 2 Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies. Cookiebot 1 Learn more about this provider CookieConsent Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain Expiry Type widget.sndcdn.com sc_anonymous_id Used in context with the 3D-view-function on the website. Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in. www.tcv.com theme-ui-color-mode Remembers the user's preferences in terms of font size and colours on the website. 4 Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously. Google _ga Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website. _ga_# Used by Google Analytics to collect data on the number of times a user has visited the website as well as dates for the first and most recent visit. embed-cdn.spotifycdn.com sentryReplaySession Registers data on visitors' website-behaviour. This is used for internal analysis and website optimization. number(#) Used to track user’s interaction with embedded content. 3 Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers. Spotify sp_landing Used to implement audio-content from Spotify on the website. Can also be used to register user interaction and preferences in context with audio-content - This can serve statistics and marketing purposes. sp_t WIDGET::local::assignments Used by audio-platform SoundCloud to implement, measure and improve their embedded content/service on the website - The collection of data also includes visitors’ interaction with embedded content/service. This can be used for statistics or marketing purposes. Unclassified 0 Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies. We do not use cookies of this type. Cross-domain consent [#BULK_CONSENT_DOMAINS_COUNT#] List of domains your consent applies to: Cookie declaration last updated on 4/16/24 by [#IABV2_TITLE#] [#IABV2_BODY_LEGITIMATE_INTEREST_INTRO#] [#IABV2_BODY_PREFERENCE_INTRO#] [#IABV2_LABEL_PURPOSES#] [#IABV2_BODY_PURPOSES_INTRO#] [#IABV2_BODY_FEATURES#] Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient. thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain tcv.com is registered and has been in existence since 1995, with an expiration date in 2033. This longevity is a positive sign, as scam websites often have a short lifespan. The domain uses a privacy service to mask the registrant's details, which is common for businesses protecting their privacy. The website also has a status of clientTransferProhibited, indicating that it cannot be transferred without the owner's consent, adding to its legitimacy. There are no immediate red flags here, but I will continue to verify other aspects to ensure the site's credibility. I should check the website's SSL certificate to ensure it is valid and secure, as scam websites often have issues with their certificates or do not have any.

The certificate is valid for portfoliojobs.tcv.com, which seems to be a subdomain of the main site. The presence of a valid SSL certificate is a good indicator of a secure website, as it means that the site's owners have taken steps to ensure the security of data transmission.
